name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad
description: Bring Turbo’s incredible snail stunts and races to life! Turbo: Super Stunt Squad is a high-velocity action racing game featuring the super-charged crew from the film Turbo. Each character has their own signature style and tricked-out skills such as jumps, drifts, grinds, flips and other super-cool stunt moves. Expert skills will also prove useful to earn power-ups, customize your character, discover shortcuts, and win the race in the larger-than-life environments of Turbo! • Perform awesome stunts! – Use the environment to perform one-of-a-kind Turbo-ized stunts to get ahead in the race • Shells with unique abilities – Each shell gives to your character unique abilities!
